page.title: 04MY FAMILY BY LEE HUCKLE
page.content: MY NAME IS LEE HUCKLE AND I HAVE A FAMILY OF FOUR.IN OUR FAMILY ARE MUM, DAD,MY BROTHER STEVEN AND ME.WE HAVE GOT QUITE A BIG HOUSE FOR FOUR OF US. WE HAVE FIVE ROOMS UPSTAIRS AND SIX ROOMS DOWNSTAIRS.MY MUM AND DAD BOTH WORK,MY MUM WORKS IN DISS SHE HAS TWO JOBS,MAKING STAINED GLASS AND SHE HAS HER OWN SHOP.MY DAD WORKS AS A DEPUTY HEADMASTER AT WITNESHAM C.P. SCHOOL. WE HAVE GOT THREE CARS,A GREEN RENAULT, A MINI AND A BROKEN DOWN WHITE BEETLE, VOLKSWAGON.ON WEEKENDS WE SOMETIMES GO OUT WITH OUR PARENTS BUT WE ARE VERY LUCKY IF WE DO.WE GO ON HOLIDAY EVERY YEAR TO NORTON IN CLEVELAND, WE LIKE TO GO WALKING.AT HOME MUM AND DAD ARE ALWAYS BUSY BUT I PLAY ON MY BIKE AND MY BROTHER USUALLY WATCHES TELEVISION, UNLESS SOMEONE CALLS FOR HIM.
